description:
• Nearly 50,000 happy students enrolled in our courses
  • Over 1500Â TOP reviews
  • The course is presented by an Award Winning Udemy Instructor Jimmy Naraine
  • It is co-presented by Dr. Roy Naraine - a medical doctor with over 20 years' of experience in self-improvement training.
  • No risk involved. Watch our PREVIEW VIDEOS!

Do you have moments when negative energy is stopping you from taking important actions and living up to your true potential? You lack motivation and can't get yourself to do what really matters. Deep inside you know that you deserve to be happy, but for some strange reason you just can't summon that positive energy. Your glass is always half empty and you are trapped by negativity. If this is how you feel then this course is right for you.

Our videos are not just a pep talk that will motivate you for a day. Instead, we will share with you great tools and proven strategies that you can implement on a daily basis to develop a positive mindset and improve your self esteem. You will transform how you feel about yourself and how you perceive the world. The only thing we ask for is your firm commitment to follow through and to implement the advice from this course. In addition, there will be 7 fresh BONUS videos by 10th Sept 2015. We hope that you will enjoy your journey with us and see you on the other side!
title: The Power of Positive Thinking -  Develop a Positive Mindset
instructors: Jimmy Naraine, Adam Naraine, Dr. Roy Naraine
